BLOCK.COMMENT.description:
Creates a line comment for a block.
Example: # VAL: Init

BLOCK.LOOP.description: LOOP Block/Value Spec - Needed to instruct the system to loop back until all elements in a SCENARIO_LOOP_CONTROL have been visited.

BLOCK.VAL.description: VAL Block/Value Spec - Creates parameters inside the execution context.

BLOCK.SQL.description: SQL Block/Value Spec - Executes a SQL statement with parameters as given by the arguments.

BLOCK.VAR.description: VAR Block/Value Spec - Updates variables on an object as given by the arguments.

BLOCK.ATTRIB.description: ATTRIB Block/Value Spec - Updates attributes on an object as given by the arguments.

BLOCK.DISALLOW.description: DISALLOW Block/Value Spec - Throws an exception to stop the execution.

BLOCK.EMAIL.description: EMAIL Block/Value Spec - Sends an email properties as given by the arguments.

BLOCK.ENC.description: ENC Block/Value Spec - Executes an encapsulated event with properties as given by the arguments.

BLOCK.EVT.description: EVT Block/Value Spec - Creates an Eyelit application event with properties as given by the arguments.

BLOCK.EXE.description: EXE Block/Value Spec - Executes the specified Eyelit view class with properties as given by the arguments.

BLOCK.MDA.description: MDA Block/Value Spec - Executes MfdUnit disposition action with properties as given by the arguments.

BLOCK.RSI.description: RSA Block/Value Spec - Executes a scenario on a remote system (Remote Scenario Invocation).

BLOCK.SCRPT.description: SCRPT Execution Block/Value Spec - Executes selected script language with properties given by the arguments.

BLOCK.XML.description: XML Execution Block/Value Spec - Creates an XML Event with properties as specified by the arguments.

BLOCK.SCN.description: Scenario Execution Block/Value Spec - Triggers the execution of an embedded Scenario.
